description:
[EuroPython 2023 — Forum Hall on 2023-07-20]
https://ep2023.europython.eu/session/cyber-resilience-act-panel

The [EU Cyber Resilience Act (CRA)](https://digital-strategy.ec.europa.eu/en/library/cyber-resilience-act) may have a huge impact on the open-source community. There are concerns about how this framework would be applied to the open-source software contribution and distribution. If you would like to know more and voice out your concerns, join our sessions with leaders in the Python community and experts in the field.

title: Cyber Resilience Act Panel
